title: 520 - A COVID Snapshot with Dr. Tom Inglesby: Where We’ve Been, Where We Are, and Where We’re Headed
itunes:title: 520 - A COVID Snapshot with Dr. Tom Inglesby: Where We’ve Been, Where We Are, and Where We’re Headed
description: Tom Inglesby, director of the Center for Health Security returns to the podcast to talk with Josh Sharfstein about the current state of COVID. They discuss the pandemic situation in the US and around the world, and how they are managing their own lives at a moment when it seems like most people are ready to move on.

They discuss the pandemic situation in the US and around the world, and how they are managing their own lives at a moment when it seems like most people are ready to move on.
